name: Sneak Attack
description:
Sneak Attack

This game is a simple top-down shooter that was made for Wowie Game Jam 2.0

How to play

WASD to move.

Aim with your mouse, and click to shoot.

Move to the left (A) and the enemies will start following you.

The enemies are fast, so to escape from a hoard of enemies walk the character out of the screen, they will no longer follow you. However, exiting the screen will make you lose 10 points and you will no longer be able to shoot until you re-enter. This is the intentional bug for the theme.

For each triangle (objective) you pick up, you gain 100 points.

Credits

Thanks to Jonas for the Wowie Resource Pack! I used this pack for all of the sound effects.
